entry.content: I need to log off. Terminally online leftists are really getting to me. Bullies, the lot of them. Rotten and self-righteous without any substance to back up their principles. I'm tired of their justifications, because it too often results in the wrong people getting hurt by them. I don't want to fall victim to divide-and-distract tactics, and yet when I feel so alone in my frustrations, it's difficult to focus on more important things.
